info.name: Flickr WideScreen - (GM) - Flickr SET view 150x150
info.description: IT is for A WIDE SCREEN (1920x1080)! It is an adaptation for these Usescript (Greasemonkey): ▶ Flickr set view 150x150 thumbnails (USO :8080) by Bushman.K : "Makes Thumbnail view on Flickr using large 150x150 "q"-size thumbnails in six columns " and ▶ Number of Favs on Photostream Photos, and Pool pages (USO :8080) By Alesa Dam : ▷▷▷ Flickr WideScreen - (GM) Flickr SET view 150x150 v.2 , What this style do ???: - Thumbnail fit all your (wide) screen. - The Set Description Panel is visible only on hover. - Add space between each row for the Alesa Dam script ▷▷▷ It's a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
